prefixColor.name: Prefix color
prefixColor.description: This option changes the color theme of the "BF Â»" prefix which is prepended to addon messages.

friendNoteTagConfig.name: Friend note tags
friendNoteTagConfig.description: This feature displays an additional tag next to your friends' names, showing the text from their friend note. It can serve as a replacement for the FriendTags addon.

defaultTag.name: Fallback tag
defaultTag.description: This is a fallback text which appears for friends without an explicit friend note. Leave it empty to disable it.

friendPrefix.name: Friend prefix in chat
friendPrefix.description: This will be prepended to friend messages. You can leave this empty to disable.

friendRemovalNotifications.name: Friend gets removed from your friend list
friendRemovalNotifications.description: Note that this will also notify you when you remove them from your friend list as there is no way to check who was performing the action.

restartWhenMuted.name: Restart VoiceChat when adding friends when globally muted
restartWhenMuted.description: When you are globally muted, only your friends can hear you. Normally, after adding a friend, you need to restart the VoiceChat addon for them to hear you. Enabling this option will automatically reconnect your VoiceChat (only while globally muted) whenever you add a new friend.

widgets.name: BetterFriends
widgets.description: Shows you live information about your LabyMod friends

errors.notConnected: You're not connected to the LabyChat!

join.enterAddress: Please provide a valid server address!

read.manual: This command can't be run manually!
read.success: The message was marked as read.

message.enterText: Please enter the message content you want to send!

friendRemoval.title: Friend removed!
friendRemoval.description: Either you removed %s as a friend or they removed you.

friendRequest.message: %s just sent you a friend request!

automatedAction.accepted: %s sent a friend request which was automatically accepted.
automatedAction.declined: %s sent a friend request which was automatically declined.
